title: 谁有黏土兵加安装教程
author: p2281026435866

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
1. 强制更新 准备干净的jar
2. 开始 运行 输入%appdata%/.minecraft/bin 备份里面的jar
3. 用7zip之类的解压软件打开jar
4. 删meta-inf
5. 根据我签名里地址 装好Modloader
6. 将粘土人里的所有东西也拖进jar里

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-5431-1-1.html Modloader教程 其他mod都一样安装

replies.author: p2281026435866
replies.txt_content:
green丶bastard 发表于 2011-10-6 19:04 
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-5431-1-1.html Modloader教程 其他mod都一样安装
我没黏土兵啊

replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-10762-1-2.html
粘土兵，下次求mod时先翻一翻再说
